body.name: Mini Ironing Machine Handheld Can Be Rotated 180 Degrees, Travel Iron for Clothes, Professional Household Fast Heating Wired Small Electric Iron, Portable Heat Press Clothing Iron Machine (Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 18 mins
features: 【Mini Iron for Clothes】The hand-held travel iron is designed to be compact and lightweight, and it is only palm-sized after being folded. Dry and wet double ironing, flat ironing, hanging ironing can be used. It is very convenient to carry and use whether at home or traveling.

【Wet & Dry Ironing】Professional micro steam iron for dry and wet ironing. 50ml water tank, plug in the power to quickly heat up in 30 seconds. After turning on the machine, turn on the spray to humidify the clothes. After the clothes are wet, turn off the spray button to start ironing.

【Unique Design】Fully ironing, leaving no corners. The triangular tip design allows you to easily finish ironing. Buttons, lapels, necklaces and other narrow areas can be ironed flexibly with exquisite details. The handle can be rotated by 180°, making it more comfortable to use.

【All-purpose Fabric Support】Suitable for high temperature dry and wet ironing of any fabrics such as cotton, polyester, silk, etc. The foldable garment ironing machine can effectively remove creases and wrinkles on clothes through steam. The operation is simple and safe to use.

【Efficient and Portable】The powerful portable iron efficiency makes life more refined, easily removing wrinkles on fabrics such as clothes, shirts, curtains, bed sheets and other fabrics, and can be put in suitcases and backpacks, and can be carried and used anytime, anywhere. Make your clothes look elegant and quality in a few minutes.
body.description: Family Travel Essentials: Portable Mini Travel Iron for clothes benefits from an ergonomic handle design that allows you to iron comfortably without feeling the strain on your wrists and shoulders. The Mini Travel Iron is designed with a high-tech chip that intelligently adjusts the voltage and can automatically switch between 100v-240v. This Mini Travel Iron can be the perfect gift for any occasion, such as anniversaries, birthdays, Christmas, weddings, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PORTABLE TRAVEL MICRO IRON The hand-held Mini Travel Iron is designed to be compact and lightweight, and it is only palm-sized after being folded. Dry and wet double ironing, flat ironing, hanging ironing can be used. It is very convenient to carry and use whether at home or traveling.

Large capacity water storage design We have a 50ml transparent visualization water tank, Integrated machine design，convenient to add water, which can iron multiple pieces of clothing at one time when traveling. Pointed detail design Electric Travel Iron adopts a pointed detail design. Flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, and collars, allowing the details to be displayed elegantly. High-temperature jet design After the water in the water storage tank is heated at high temperature, the fine high-temperature water mist is sprayed from the uniform pores under the pressure of the button, which can effectively iron the clothes while achieving high temperature.

The handle can be rotated by 180°, making it more comfortable to use. Fully ironing, leaving no corners. The triangular tip design allows you to easily finish ironing. Buttons, lapels, necklaces and other narrow areas can be ironed flexibly with exquisite details.

Family Travel Essentials: Portable Mini Travel Iron for clothes benefits from an ergonomic handle design that allows you to iron comfortably without feeling the strain on your wrists and shoulders. The Mini Travel Iron is designed with a high-tech chip that intelligently adjusts the voltage and can automatically switch between 100v-240v. This Mini Travel Iron can be the perfect gift for any occasion, such as anniversaries, birthdays, Christmas, weddings, etc. Package Includes: 1 X Mini Travel Iron 1 X Manual 1 X Measuring Glass 1 X Silicone Anti-scalding Pad

Necessary Precautions: You must unplug the power supply after you finish using it.Don't put the iron directly on top of the article, it must be placed on the thermal insulation silicone pad.Do not burn dry, add water to the water storage tank in time.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but not enough heating power
reviews.reviewText: I loved the look of this iron but sadly it didn’t have enough heating power to take the wrinkles out, I had to do many passes to get ok results. 😕

reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing it does the works and so light and little but not so heavy it’s great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not get hot
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product based on the reviews I read. After receiving it, I tried it for a few times and it does not work. The first time I plugged in the iron, it got warm for about five minutes and was not able to remain warm or even gotten hot enough to iron clothes. I have tried it a few times after that..... it does not work at all. Love the colour.
